text: Cassie Cage is a fictional character in the Mortal Kombat Series. She is the daughter of Johnny Cage and Sonya Blade. ==Portrayals== She was most prominently and notably portrayed in the games by both Ashley Burch and Erica Lindbeck. ==Reception== Cassie Cage has been well-liked by fans for her very most appealing personality and gameplay character development. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2015 Category:Mortal Kombat characters
title: Cassie Cage
